title: Advanced Biopharmaceutics
description: A comprehensive course dealing with the interaction of biological and physicochemical considerations relating to drug effectiveness and dosage form design.

title: Pharmaceutical Stability
description: Special topics in selected areas of industrial and physical pharmacy. Permission of instructor required.

title: Seminar In Industrial And Physical Pharmacy
description: Discussion of recent research developments in physical pharmacy, industrial pharmacy, and biopharmaceutics related to the physicochemical properties, availability, effectiveness, and safety of drugs and drug products. Topics are presented by staff, students, and invited speakers.
